title: AFC North Offseason Priorities: Which team will set themselves up as the biggest contender? (Football 2/23)
description:
Our offseason priority series continues with a focus on the AFC North. Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Josh Edwards tackle the needs of the Bengals (5:00), Browns (17:00), Ravens (31:00) and Steelers (43:15). In Cincy, it's all about supporting Joe Burrow. The Bengals have a top pick and plenty of money to spend, but they must approach this offseason wisely (not always a given for that franchise). Cleveland is coming off its most successful season in years and looks to build upon their future, which may not include Odell Beckham Jr. anymore. As of now, Baltimore actually has the best Super Bowl odds in the division, but must aim to add more weapons around Lamar Jackson. And Pittsburgh...There's lots of questions with free agents but the bigger lingering question is with Ben Roethlisberger and his diminished play. Check out all the draft and free agency priorities for the AFC North on this episode. 
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/

To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
